titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to W. H. Averill
CWG13667

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 12.
THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
To W. H. Averill, Dr.
18654.

row.cell: To Drugs Medicines &c furnished State Hospital at Frankfort Ky per order Dr W H. Gardner as per bill filed herewith

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

Wm H. Gardner
Surgeon in Charge Hospital Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 14 of April, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of One hundred and four dollars and Sixty nine cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

209
No. 12.
No 66 Abstract. G
W. H. Averill
Dollars 104.69/100
Paid April 14th, 1864.
Hospital
J239
Certificate No 141
